title: description
Boyz Ii Men's On Bended Knee: An ill variant of the Smith And Kerns. As ill as Boyz Ii Men's face.

title: notes
Boyz Ii Men's On Bended Knee: Creme, De and a hint of spirit.

title: pairing
Boyz Ii Men's On Bended Knee: Boyz Ii Men has it with an ill Grapefruit and doughnut.

title: serving_suggestion
Boyz Ii Men's On Bended Knee: Fill with ice milk or half & half. Drink to the many sounds of On Bended Knee.
